    • Method Detail

      • withApplication

        public AccountStoreMappingOptions withApplication()
        Description copied from interface: AccountStoreMappingOptions
        Ensures that when retrieving an AccountStoreMapping, the AccountStoreMapping's application is also retrieved in the same request. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.
        Specified by:
        withApplication in interface AccountStoreMappingOptions<AccountStoreMappingOptions>
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

        public AccountStoreMappingOptions withAccountStore()
        Description copied from interface: AccountStoreMappingOptions
        Ensures that when retrieving an AccountStoreMapping, the AccountStoreMapping's accountStore is also retrieved in the same request. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.

        withAccountStore in interface AccountStoreMappingOptions<AccountStoreMappingOptions>
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
